this_title: ยองบ่าง yong bang the movie
introduction: British foreigner Benjamin was sent to Thailand in the Northeast to fetch British diamonds.stolen back Benjamin ascertained that the present diamond was in a 9-inch Buddha image located in the ordination hall of Wat Phra Sai. There is a Luang Ta Phuang (a bunch Chuan smile) is an abbot. From the first time, the goal was to come and get the diamond back, but the diamond was in the Buddha image. Seeing that Phra Martin and the villagers worship the Buddha image a lot, Benjamin therefore cooperates with Lieutenant Chet (Pichet Kongkarn) to help protect the Buddha image from the hands of Willy Negro, a foreigner who plans to come and snatch the Buddha image. go With Kamnanphon (Pornsak Songkran) and Teacher Nok (Nok Noi Uraiphon) helping with the whole village.
